search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Affinity (affinity.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Affinity products can be found at: [https://affinity.serif.com/purchase/](https://affinity.serif.com/purchase/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
We offer a range of affordable, subscription-free buying options for individuals, businesses and educational institutions. Please select the relevant section below for further details on pricing and available volume discounts.

![Image 1: Affinity V2 Universal License logo](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/global/logos/universal-logo-180320221056.png)

Affinity V2 Universal License

For macOS, Windows & iPadOS

USD$164.99

One-off paymentexcl. tax

Get Version 2 of Affinity Designer, Affinity Photo and Affinity Publisher on all operating systems, including iPad, for one low bundle price.

![Image 2: Affinity Designer 2 logo](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/global/logos/affinity-designer-2-020520191502.svg)

*   **Affinity Designer 2** | macOS
*   **Affinity Designer 2** | Windows
*   **Affinity Designer 2** | iPadOS

![Image 3: Affinity Photo 2 logo](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/global/logos/affinity-photo-2-020520191502.svg)

*   **Affinity Photo 2** | macOS
*   **Affinity Photo 2** | Windows
*   **Affinity Photo 2** | iPadOS

![Image 4: Affinity Publisher 2 logo](https://cdn.serif.com/affinity/img/global/logos/affinity-publisher-2-020520191502.svg)

*   **Affinity Publisher 2** | macOS
*   **Affinity Publisher 2** | Windows
*   **Affinity Publisher 2** | iPadOS

All apps. All platforms.No subscription.

Desktop apps

Affinity Designer 2

For macOS or Windows

USD$69.99

One-off payment | excl. tax

Create a range of unique designs, from concept art to logos and web mock-ups.

Affinity Photo 2

For macOS or Windows

USD$69.99

One-off payment | excl. tax

Edit and retouch images, create multi-layered compositions and so much more.

Affinity Publisher 2

For macOS or Windows

USD$69.99

One-off payment | excl. tax

Create stunning page layouts for brochures, posters, reports and other projects.

iPad apps

Affinity Designer 2 for iPad

For iPadOS

USD$18.49

One-off payment | excl. tax

Create a range of unique designs, from concept art to logos and web mock-ups.

Affinity Photo 2 for iPad

For iPadOS

USD$18.49

One-off payment | excl. tax

Edit and retouch images, create multi-layered compositions and so much more.

Affinity Publisher 2 for iPad

For iPadOS

USD$18.49

One-off payment | excl. tax

Create stunning page layouts for brochures, posters, reports and other projects.

Creative software used by professionals all over the world. See our complete list of purchase and trial options to find the one that suits you best.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Affinity offers one-time payment options for its software products without subscription requirements.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Includes Affinity Designer, Affinity Photo, and Affinity Publisher for macOS, Windows, and iPadOS.

features: Design creation for concept art, logos, and web mock-ups
